appetizers.name: Mediterranean Platter & Dip
appetizers.description: A delightful array of veggies and dippables to enjoy with our original garlic avocado hummus.

appetizers.name: Greek Meatballs Keftethakia
appetizers.description: Declicious bite-sized meatballs with tasty Greek herbs fried in olive oil.

appetizers.name: Roasted Olives
appetizers.description: Bursting with flavor, enjoy these roasted olives with incredible herbs to bring out their flavor.

cold sands.name: Classic Greek Gyro
cold sands.description: Full of spices, these gyros are filled with delicious meat, tzatziki sauce, and all the fixings you could imagine.

cold sands.name: Home Style Sandwich
cold sands.description: Simply delicious- a classic take on a greek delight. The Home Style Sandwich will tickle the senses.

hot sands.name: Greek Salad Sandwich
hot sands.description: Warm bread topped with delicious sauce, cucumbers, olives, feta, and MORE.

hot sands.name: Meatball Sub
hot sands.description: Our delicious meatballs in a sub with all the toppings you could want.

desserts.name: Greek Filo Pull-Apart
desserts.description: This Greek-inspired pastry dessert is perfect for a cold winter's night.

desserts.name: Lemon Bougatsa
desserts.description: Perfect for sharing, this Greek dessert is sweet, tasty, and low-fat. Served with ice cream.

drinks.name: Coke
drinks.description: The best way to enjoy some calories.

drinks.name: Water
drinks.description: The best beverage known to humankind. Simple. Delicious. Refreshing.
